name: Invigorating Gemstone
flavorText: “Some say this stone derives its power from its owners life force, which is shortened with each use. Well I say any fight I can walk away from is a victory, and tomorrow can take care of itself.” - Famed warrior Lenalas, the day before his death
flavorTextHtml: “Some say this stone derives its power from its owners life force, which is shortened with each use. Well I say any fight I can walk away from is a victory, and tomorrow can take care of itself.” - Famed warrior Lenalas, the day before his death

secondary.textHtml: Each hit done increases healing received by 1.00% for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times. 1.00%
